abstract: South Korean military reservist shoots one soldier and wounds three others at training ground in Seoul before killing himself.
lead_paragraph: The army reservist killed one person and wounded three others at a firing range, an official said, in the latest case to raise concerns about military discipline.

headline.main: South Korean Reservist Goes on Shooting Rampage Before Killing Himself
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; South Korea: A Soldier’s Fatal Outburst

snippet: The army reservist killed one person and wounded three others at a firing range, an official said, in the latest case to raise concerns about military discipline.
